name: Enforcer: 出る釘は打たれる。
name_original: Enforcer: 出る釘は打たれる。
description:
Game Objective:  Destroy the evil corporate banker robot and free society from the chains of unjust corporate greed. 

Avoid the evil flying money token the banker robot shoots at you and don't get too close to him, because he will drain  you of your life. 

Controls:

I,J,K,L - Move left, right, forward and back

U, O  - Pan camera left right

Spacebar - Shoot

Shift - Fly

Escape - Quit

Important note:

You need to have the latest .Net 4.0 and XNA 4.0 runtime libraries installed on your system in order to run Enforcer.

You can download them from here:

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=20914
